select
from plg_user where 1=1
and (username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') or mobile like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') or email like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') )
